Text: Thank you very very very much!!!!

I was skeptical at first when I downloaded it, but this is the real deal. Thank You!!!

Just like Bedlam this album takes a few listens to really start getting into; but once it does, it infects your soul like a heavenly virus. Smoke a bowl, pop some caps and enjoy. And then go buy it on the 27th!!
So the thing is with this album, get past the first track. It's meant to ward off casual listners. It kinda just sounds bad if you aren't accustomed to this band. Rest of the album is gold.
Make sure to buy it!!!  Support TMV
thanks very much, fella. you done good.
